name: Tiki Terror
description:
In Tiki Terror!, you are a poor soul who must appease the volcano god who rules over your little island. You must feed his hunger for llamas, sheep, virgins... and worse! Woe to you if you cannot give him what he desires when he wants it.

Joseph Jolton - Production & GUI Design

Alex Carlson - Developer & Sound Designer

Krista McCullough - Artist & Level Designer

Anna Taberko - Artist & Animator

Rob Castellano - Soundtrack Composer
